Text:
I'm drunk. Otherwise I wouldn't bother downloading a Hindi movie. Because they suck. (Save the oldies). Now, the main thing I want you "skull" holders to notice is that your releases need a little more info about the "upload" - "what kind" of "dvd rip", quality of audio and video, and sample pictures from the uploaded stuff. You might actually gain some more respect as well.
Happy New Year. :)
You are drunk for sure Nabarum!! All requested info are included in the description above.
